feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-10T20:01:54.157304Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;MusicGen：简单可控的音乐生成</stitle>; <id>;https://ai.honu.io/papers/musicgen/</id>; <updated>;2023-06- 10T17:01:00.019433Z</updated>; <link href="https://ai.honu.io/papers/musicgen/"/>; <author>; <name>;og_kalu</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=og_kalu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章介绍了MusicGen，一种可以在以文本描述为条件的同时生成高质量音乐样本的单一语言模型或旋律特征。它优于标准文本到音乐基准测试中的其他评估基线。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#musicgen-simple-and-controllable-music-generation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36271926" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;比什么快 10~17 倍？ Intel x86-SIMD-sort (AVX-512) 性能分析</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Voultapher/sort-research-rs/blob/main/writeup/intel_avx512/text.md< /id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T19:01:00.020081Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/Vultapher/sort-research-rs/blob/main/writeup/intel_avx512/text .md"/>; <author>; <name>;Twirrim</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Twirrim</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Vultapher/sort-research-rs/main/writeup/intel_avx512/assets/hot-u64-10k-windows.png" style="宽度：220px；高度： 289 像素；" />;<br />;Ipnsort 展示了与 x86-simd-sort 相当的性能，同时是通用的，优化的不仅仅是峰值性能。与 skylake linux 机器相比，crumsort 表现出明显更差的性能，对于更大的尺寸和大多数随机模式，速度慢 2.4 倍。 intel_avx512 仅支持 avx-512 设备，但是 vqsort 是在支持各种平台的 simd 抽象高速公路之上编写的，<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#10-17x-faster-than-what- a-performance-analysis-of-intel-x86-simd-sort-avx-512" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36273544" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;OBS 合并 WebRTC 支持</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/obsproject/obs-studio/commit/851a8c216e14617fb523951839f3bdb240e85141</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T19:01:00.020611Z </updated>; <link href="https://github.com/obsproject/obs-studio/commit/851a8c216e14617fb523951839f3bdb240e85141"/>; <author>; <name>;Sean-Der</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/用户？ Sproject/obsTudio /commit/851a8c216e14617fb523951839f3bdb240e85141" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;这增加了一个 WHIP 输出和相关服务。 - 代码灵感来自 DDRBoxman - 由 Sean DuBois & tt2468 实施 - pkv 的各种修复和贡献。合着 -通过：tt24 ... <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#obs-merges-webrtc-support" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36273075" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;列出一项任务，完成，划掉</stitle>; <id>;https://www.oliverburkeman.com/onething</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-10T16:01:00.021121Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.oliverburkeman.com/onething"/>; <author>; <name>;Tomte</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/053ea9_019073577d0445b6b521687231c3166f~mv2.png /v1/fill/w_268,h_247,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/1621444132.png" style="width: 220px; height: 203px;" />;<br />;作者反思了他们在紧急情况下保持冷静和机智的能力，将其归因于没有自我怀疑和清楚需要做什么。他们认为关键提高生产力不是尝试同时处理多项任务，而是一次专注于一件事，然后更好地决定下一步该做什么。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#list-one- task-do-it-cross-it-out" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36253882" target="_blank ">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;LLM.int8 ()：大规模变压器的 8 位矩阵乘法（2022）</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2208.07339</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T16:01:00.021623Z </updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2208.07339"/>; <author>; <name>;tosh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =tosh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png " style="宽度: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;本文描述了 Transformer 中 Int8 矩阵乘法的过程，该过程将推理所需的内存减少一半，同时保持全精度性能。这是通过两部分量化过程 LLM 实现的。 int8()，其中包括向量量化和针对异常值的混合精度分解方案。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llm-int8-8-bit-matrix-multiplication-for -transformers-at-scale-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36271112" target="_blank">;[ comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;去中心化案例在线论坛</stitle>; <id>;https://viksit.com/blog/case-for-decentralization-online-forums</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T18:01:00.022052Z</updated>; < link href="https://viksit.com/blog/case-for-decentralization-online-forums"/>; <author>; <name>;viksit</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=viksit</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Reddit 和 Stackoverflow 最近的行动凸显了中心化平台的问题，包括用户体验受损和创造力受到抑制。解决方案在于去中心化，它提供更大的抵御审查和网络攻击的弹性，以及更可持续和以用户为中心的货币化方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-case-for-the-decentralization-of-online-forums" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36272935" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Golang 的最佳秘密：“可执行示例”</stitle>; <id>;https://bitfieldconsulting.com/golang/examples</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T15:01:00.022552Z</更新>; <link href="https://bitfieldconsulting.com/golang/examples"/>; <author>; <name>;gus_leonel</name>; <uri>;https //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gus_leonel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/5e10bdc20efb8f0d169f85f9 /1667998545795-U2LE9NW2BDTDQMCQZT3Q/lifebelt.png?content-type=image%2Fpng" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;Go 提供了一个称为可执行示例的功能，它允许代码包含在自动生成的文档中，并以与测试相同的方式自动验证。这些示例是真正的 Go 代码，无需安装 Go 即可在 Web 浏览器中编辑和运行。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#golangs-best-kept-secret-executable-examples" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270851" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;许可对于解决人工智能风险既不可行也无效</stitle>; <id>;https://aisnakeoil.substack.com/p/licensing-is-neither-feasible-也不</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T14:01:00.023021Z</更新>; <link href="https://aisnakeoil.substack.com/p/licensing-is-neither-feasible-nor"/ >; <author>; <name>;headalgorithm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=headalgorithm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1200,h_600,c_fill,f_jpg,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep,g_auto/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic %2Fimages%2F4239d7c6-4f55-4254-91f2-20b9b2bec77e_1118x639.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：119px；" />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了将不扩散作为使 AI 更安全的一种方式的想法，但认为许可和执法将是困难且无效的。相反，作者建议学术界、公司和非政府组织组成的多元化团体应该开发和评估最先进的模型来应对人工智能风险。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#licensing-is-neither-feasible-nor-effective-for-addressing-ai-risks" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270303" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;梅赛德斯在加州自动驾驶领域击败特斯拉</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/ 09/mercedes_california_tesla/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T14:01:00.023517Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/09/mercedes_california_tesla/"/ >; <author>; <name>;belter</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=belter</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= "https://regmedia.co.uk/2023/06/09/californiahighway.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;梅赛德斯-奔驰在加利福尼亚州首次获得授权，可以向公众出售或租赁带有自动驾驶系统的车辆，但有限制。 DRIVE PILOT 系统是一个 3 级自动化系统，可以在某些情况下主动执行驾驶任务，而无需人类驾驶员的主动控制，尽管驾驶员必须留在方向盘后面以在出现提示时接管。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mercedes-beats-tesla-to-autonomous-driving-in-california" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270413" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;展示HN：用600行C89编写的RISC-V核心</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/mnurzia/rv</ id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T14:01:00.024056Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/mnurzia/rv"/>; <author>; <name>;mnurzia</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mnurzia</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/1d346e7d2c07527cfa732a9027a3210b112cc6fcab5bb511c9c29b996e6e8317/ mnurzia/rv" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;转储一个从 0x80000000 开始的二进制文件，它可以由 rv 直接加载，如上例所示：不使用任何大于 32 位的整数类型，即使是乘法，因为它是用C89写的。以不完全符合 C89/99 的方式假定整数类型的宽度。很快就会修复这个问题，我正在研究一个防水的 <stdint.h>;;对于 C89。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-risc-v-core-written-in-600-lines-of-c89" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270150" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;纽约市将向前往市区的司机收费</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cnn.com/2023/ 06/10/business/congestion-pricing-new-york-city-transportation/index.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T15:01:00.024743Z</更新>; <link href="https:/ /www.cnn.com/2023/06/10/business/congestion-pricing-new-york-city-transportation/index.html"/>; <author>; <name>;rntn</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rntn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.cnn.com/api/v1/images/stellar /prod/230530162322-04-congestion-pricing-new-york-city-restricted.jpg?c=16x9&q=h_720,w_1280,c_fill" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;拜登总统的政府允许纽约市实施一项名为“拥堵收费”的收费计划，向进入曼哈顿下城的司机收费，建议在高峰时段收费 9 至 23 美元。收费旨在减少拥堵，改善公共交通，并产生收入以资助 150 亿美元的未来投资，以实现城市公共交通系统的现代化。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#new-york-city-will-charge-drivers-going-downtown" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270597" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;开源许可证是否涵盖忒修斯之船？</stitle>; <id>;https://shkspr.mobi/blog/2023/06/do- open-source-licences-cover-the-ship-of-theseus/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T15:01:00.025348Z</updated>; <link href="https://shkspr.mobi/ blog/2023/06/do-open-source-licences-cover-the-ship-of-theseus/"/>; <author>; <name>;edent</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=edent</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://shkspr.mobi/apple-touch-icon.png" style="width: 220px;高度：221px；" />;<br />;作者下载了一个带有归属许可的HTML模板，但最终重写了75%的HTML和更改了61%的CSS。他们质疑是否仍需要根据许可条款注明原作者的身份。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#do-open-source-licences-cover-the-ship-of-theseus" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36256325" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;什么是彩色？ (2021)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.studiobinder.com/blog/what-is-technicolor-definition/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T19:01:00.025910Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.studiobinder.com/blog/what-is-technicolor-definition/"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s.studiobinder.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/什么-is-Technicolor-StudioBinder.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;Technicolor 是用于在电影中制作色彩的一系列流程，该公司在 1916 年至 1932 年期间对其系统进行了修补，以使好莱坞可以使用该流程。 Technicolor 电影以其明亮、大胆、饱和的色彩而闻名。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-is-technicolor-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36254776" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;DeArrow：在 YouTube 上众包更好的标题和缩略图</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ajayyy/DeArrow</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T19:10 :00.026423Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/ajayyy/DeArrow"/>; <author>; <name>;tech234a</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=tech234a</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ajayyy/DeArrow/master/public/icons/logo-128。 png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;本文提供了有关如何使用 npm run build 命令生成 Chrome 或 Firefox 扩展的开发或生产版本的说明。构建的扩展可以作为 Chrome 中的解压扩展加载，也可以作为 Firefox 中的临时扩展加载。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dearrow-crowdsourcing-better-titles-and-thumbnails-on-youtube" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么大自然不允许在图像和视频中使用生成人工智能</stitle >; <id>;https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-01546-4</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T16:01:00.026820Z</更新>; <link href="https ://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-01546-4"/>; <author>; <name>;geox</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=geox </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.nature.com/lw767/magazine-assets/d41586-023-01546-4/d41586-023-01546 -4_25335740.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;出于对完整性、透明度、归属、同意和隐私的担忧，Nature 不会发布任何完全或部分使用生成式 AI 创建的照片、视频或插图的内容。但是，在生成式 AI 的帮助下生成的文本可能会包含适当的警告和文档。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-nature-will-not-allow-the-use-of-generative-ai-in-images-and-video" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36271583" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MUMPS 案例 (2007)</stitle>; <id>;https://thedailywtf. com/articles/A_Case_of_the_MUMPS</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T11:01:00.027226Z</更新>; <link href="https://thedailywtf.com/articles/A_Case_of_the_MUMPS"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ahiknsr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ahiknsr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://thedailywtf .com/images/alexp/apx-square500.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;Bryan H 在“MUMPS 商店”工作了两年多，在那里他必须学习和使用 MUMPS 编程语言。 MUMPS 是一种用于创建和维护医疗信息系统的编程语言，其语法难以使用，其设计目标是创建永远无法再由任何人维护的代码。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-case-of-the-mumps-2007" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36268931" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GCP 自动降低了我们的配额，引发了事故，拒绝升级</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/JustJake/status/1667478906591666176</id >; <updated>;2023-06-10T18:01:00.027698Z</updated>; <link href="https://twitter.com/JustJake/status/1667478906591666176"/>; <author>; <name>;teej</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=teej</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但不要担心——让我们再试一次。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gcp-automatically-lowered-our-quota-caused-an-incident-and-refused-to-upgrade" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36272747" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Apple M2 Ultra SoC 并不比 AMD 和 Intel 去年的桌面 CPU 快</stitle>; <id>;https: //wccftech.com/apple-m2-ultra-soc-isnt-faster-than-amd-intel-last-year-desktop-cpus-50-slower-than-nvidia-rtx-4080/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T17:01:00.028214Z</updated>; <link href="https://wccftech.com/apple-m2-ultra-soc-isnt-faster-than-amd-intel-last-year- desktop-cpus-50-slower-than-nvidia-rtx-4080/"/>; <author>; <name>;jacooper</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jacooper</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.wccftech.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Apple-WWDC23-M2-Ultra-UltraFusion-230605 -g-low_res-scale-2_00x-728x410.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Apple 的 M2 Ultra SoC 已经过基准测试，并与 AMD、Intel 和 NVIDIA 的芯片进行了比较，结果显示它比去年 Intel 和 AMD 的台式机 CPU 慢了 50%比 NVIDIA 的 RTX 4080 慢。M2 Ultra 具有 1340 亿个晶体管、24 个 CPU 内核、多达 76 个 GPU 内核和 192 GB 统一内存。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-m2 -ultra-soc-isnt-faster-than-amd-and-intel-last-year-desktop-cpus" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36271804" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;顶尖人才、精英大学和移民：IIT</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nber.org/papers/w31308</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-10T17:01:00.028724Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nber.org/papers/w31308"/>; <author>; <name>;kanodiaayush</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kanodiaayush</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.nber.org/sites/default/files/styles /promo/public/2022-07/Gitapromoimage.JPG?itok=DBeT3pX_" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;本文感谢为这项研究做出贡献的个人和组织，该研究基于大型数据集，重点关注精英大学顶尖人才的迁移模式，特别是印度理工学院 ( IIT）。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#top-talent-elite-colleges-and-migration-the-iits" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36254887" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;关于 Skimmers 的一切</stitle>; <id>;https://krebsonsecurity.com/all-about-skimmers/</id>; <updated >;2023-06-10T15:01:00.029250Z</updated>; <link href="https://krebsonsecurity.com/all-about-skimmers/"/>; <author>; <name>;cm_silva</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cm_silva</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://krebsonsecurity.com/wp-content/uploads /2010/08/wouldyou-300x217.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 160px;" />;<br />;这篇文章是关于 ATM 盗窃者、加油站盗窃者和其他相关欺诈设备的帖子集。作者展示了整个系列，并提供了一个方便的地方来参考所有这些故事一个地方。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#all-about-skimmers" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36255989" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;你应该建造什么？</stitle>; <id>;https://exponentially.substack.com/p/what-should-you-build</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-10T17:01:00.029640Z</updated>; <link href="https://exponentially.substack.com/p/what-should-you-build"/>; <author>; <name>;jamiegreen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jamiegreen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch /w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F807853ba-d6fe-4276-ac5b-7e83394120f1_675x499.jpeg" style ="宽度：220px； height: 163px;" />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了识别人们或公司所面临的实际问题并为他们创建解决方案的重要性，而不是想出难以置信的创业点子。它强调了将产品投入市场的必要性尽可能快地交到用户手中，以确定是否真的需要它。作者还建议不要过分担心竞争对手或有人窃取想法，因为每个伟大的创业想法的来源都是独一无二的。<a href= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-should-you-build" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36271910" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Show HN：Bloop – 使用 LLM 代理回答有关您的代码的问题</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/BloopAI/bloop</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T19： 01:00.030058Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/BloopAI/bloop"/>; <author>; <name>;louiskw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=louiskw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/ba0e103fefac552c592f7bf6aec3d2e7b6d1ef57160355eea41ba6c57c9e6b6c/68747470733a2f2f6173736 574732e626c6f6f702e61692f626c6f6f705f6769746875625f6c6f676f5f6c696768742e706e67" style="width: 220px; height: 83px;" />;<br />;Bloop 是一个开发者助手，使用 GPT-4 回答有关代码库的问题。它可以使用自然语言、正则表达式和过滤查询来搜索本地和远程存储库，以提高工作效率大型代码库。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-bloop-answer-questions-about-your-code-with-an-llm-agent" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36260961" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;风力发电到达深水</stitle>; <id>;https://spectrum. ieee.org/green-hydrogen-offshore-wind</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T15:01:00.030611Z</更新>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee.org/green-hydrogen -offshore-wind"/>; <author>; <name>;mfiguiere</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mfiguiere</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/a-man-in-safety-helmet-walks-down-a-plank-from-a-yellow-wind-energy-platform -docked-to-the-shore.jpg?id=34017178&width=1200&height=900" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;最近几周，第一批基于平台的电解厂已向海上推进。欧洲政府已经在规划海上风力加氢的联合开发。为了开始向海上转移，lhyfe 不得不缩减设备和提高可靠性。离岸优势是避免成本，并允许在欧洲和日本等人口稠密的地方进行氢气生产相关的延迟——他预计 2030 年左右将成为一个转折点。漂浮式风​​力发电可能是 <a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#wind-to-hydrogen-production-reaches-deep-water" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=36270884" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Zig 语言服务器和取消</stitle>; <id>;https://matklad.github.io/2023/05/06/zig-language-server-and-cancellation.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T07:01:00.031100Z</更新>; <link href="https://matklad.github.io/2023/05/06/zig-language-server-and-cancellation.html"/ >; <author>; <name>;goranmoomin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=goranmoomin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= "https://matklad.github.io/assets/zig-lsp.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 105px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了在为语言实现 LSP 时从可靠的数据模型开始的重要性，并探讨了在语言服务器中处理取消的不同方法。作者建议使用半空间垃圾收集方法来处理现在需要但将来不需要的内存。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#zig-language-server-and-cancellation" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36268247" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;计算机图形行业起步于犹他大学</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /spectrum.ieee.org/history-of-computer-graphics-industry</id>; <updated>;2023-06-09T22:01:00.031471Z</updated>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee. org/history-of-computer-graphics-industry"/>; <author>; <name>;sohkamyung</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sohkamyung</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/a-large-group-of-older-men-standing-for-a-group-portrait- some-sitting-on-chairs-in-front-and-others-standing-behind-them.jpg?id=34017358&width=1200&height=900" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;犹他大学通过 David Evans 和 Ivan E. Sutherland 在 1960 年代和 70 年代的开创性研究，在启动计算机图形行业方面发挥了重要作用。今天的许多计算机图形名人最初是在他们的公司 Evans and Sutherland 担任员工或博士生，在那里他们为计算机图形处理做出了基础性贡献。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-computer-graphics- industry-got-started-at-the-university-of-utah" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36264744" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;The Embeddable Common Lisp (2005) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://ecl.common-lisp.dev/static/files/papers/ecl-1995-attardi.pdf</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-10T15:01:00.031866Z</updated>; <link href="https://ecl.common-lisp.dev/static/files/papers/ecl-1995-attardi.pdf"/>; <作者>; <name>;andsoitis</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=andsoitis</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章包含 Lisp 程序的代码执行多值规划并生成随机数。该程序还包括一个用于对数计算的函数。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-embeddable-common-lisp-2005-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270565" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FBI：FISA 第 702 条对监视、错误、保护美国人“绝对关键”</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2023/06 /09/fbi_fisa_section_702_absolutely/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T15:01:00.032263Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/09/fbi_fisa_section_702_absolutely/" />; <author>; <name>;rntn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rntn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img 源="https://regmedia.co.uk/2023/06/09/fbidudes.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;联邦调查局副局长保罗·阿贝特称美国《外国情报监视法》第 702 条对于该机构继续保护美国人“绝对至关重要”。然而，702 条款在过去曾被滥用于监督美国活动家、记者和其他人，除非国会更新，否则该条款将于今年年底到期。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fbi-fisa-section-702-absolutely-critical-to-spy-on-err-protect-americans" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270554" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;1973 年的毛基辛格会议</stitle>; <id>;https://gaodawei.wordpress.com/2023 /06/08/1973-prc-notes-on-mao-kissinger-meeting-of-february-17-1973/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T00:01:00.032666Z</更新>; <链接href="https://gaodawei.wordpress.com/2023/06/08/1973-prc-notes-on-mao-kissinger-meeting-of-february-17-1973/"/>; <作者>; <姓名>;普鲁德</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=prude</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://gaodawei. files.wordpress.com/2023/06/snap493.jpg?w=1005" style="宽度：220px；高度：133px；" />;<br />;:,.; cnn ireporter john avlon：解密的外交关系文件可以让我们了解情况。 the documents are from the prc archives, but not the side account of the 1973 conversation, he says - 'only in this way can we move from hostility to relaxation in relations between peoples' if the us and china want to do business, they will never <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-mao-kissinger-meeting-of-1973" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36265771" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GitHub accused of varying Copilot output to avoid copyright allegations</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/09/github_copilot_lawsuit/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T14:01:00.033182Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/09/github_copilot_lawsuit/"/>; <author>; <name>;belter</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=belter</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2019/07/20/shutterstock_programmer.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 149px;" />;<br />;GitHub is accused of modifying its Copilot programming assistant to generate slightly different output from ingested training code in order to avoid copyright infringement claims. The amended complaint against Microsoft, GitHub, and OpenAI alleges that Copilot violates copyright law and software licensing requirements by training on publicly posted code and presenting other people's code as its own. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#github-accused-of-varying-copilot-output-to-avoid-copyright-allegations" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270427" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PlayHT (YC W23) Is Hiring a Senior ML Engineer (LLMs/Generative Models)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/playht/jobs/G6vI660-senior-ml-engineer-large-language-models</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T08:01:00.033551Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/playht/jobs/G6vI660-senior-ml-engineer-large-language-models"/>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/3d4c9619438357f2137d8fd295cf819f695c073d.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Play.ht (YC23) is building the future platform for generative media; we have the industry's highest-quality Speech Synthesis and Voice Cloning models. We are looking for Full-time Senior Machine learning Engineers to join us to build the platform that will empower millions of creators to use generative AI to create content of all types. The perfect candidate is a reliable autonomous engineer with a growth mindset and experience in Large Language Models, Generative Models, and Transformers. And preferably Speech Synthesis, GPT, and Diffusion models knowledge. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#playht-yc-w23-is-hiring-a-senior-ml-engineer-llms-generative-models" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
